abtHeader.h3: Services for business players to grow and advance.

abtp.h1: Established in June 2008, PBL offers the best logistics  solutions with expertise and network throughout Indonesia. Our team consist of experienced leaders and professional staffs with years of experience in logistics and supply chain management (SCM).
abtp.h2: At PBL, we recognize the importance of technology as. With this in mind,we proudly introduce our Integrated System, comprising Pricing Management System (PMS), Warehouse Management System (WMS), and Trucking Management System (TMS). This comprehensive suite of tools embodies our commitment to achieving unparalleled levels of efficiency and effectiveness.

Fill.h: With more than 200,000 SQM warehouse and more than 500 unit vehicles with 7 variants, we don't just handle logistics. PBL also help you succeed by combining technology with operational excellence.
